<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4526">コントロールが制限される場合は true。それ以外の場合は false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4526">true if the control is restricted; otherwise, false.</span></span>

### <a name="method-isusersetupenabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4527">メソッド isUserSetupEnabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4527">Method isUserSetupEnabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4528">コントロールが、特定のレベルのカスタマイズを許可するかどうかを示す値を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4528">Retrieves a value that indicates whether the control allows for the specified level of customization.</span></span>

    public boolean isUserSetupEnabled(int neededSetupRights)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4529">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4529">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4530">neededSetupRights</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4530">neededSetupRights</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4531">コントロールに対して照会されるカスタマイズのレベルを指定する FormAllowUserSetup 列挙の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4531">A value from the FormAllowUserSetup enumeration that specifies the level of customization that is being queried for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4532">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4532">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4533">neededSetupRights パラメーターで指定されたカスタマイズのレベルがコントロール、デザイン、および親コンテナーで許可される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4533">true if the control, design, and parent containers allow for the level of customization that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4534">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4534">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4535">次のテーブルでは、neededSetupRights パラメーターの値について説明します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4535">The following table describes the values for the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

|                                  |                                                                                                                                  |
|----------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4536">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4536">FormAllowUserSetup::No 0</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4537">コントロールに対する変更は加えられません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4537">No changes can be made to the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4538">この値が neededSetupRights パラメーターに対して設定されている場合、メソッドは常に true を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4538">If this value is set for the neededSetupRights parameter, the method always returns true.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4539">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4539">FormAllowUserSetup::Restricted 1</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4540">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4540">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4541">ユーザーがコントロールを移動できません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4541">The user cannot move the control.</span></span>   |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4542">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4542">FormAllowUserSetup::Yes 2</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4543">ユーザーはコントロールの、編集可能、表示、スキップ、ラベル、幅の各プロパティを変更できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4543">The user can change the editable, visible, skip, label, and width properties of the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4544">ユーザーはコントロールを移動することもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4544">The user can also move the control.</span></span> |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4545">「true」を返すこのメソッドについては、デザインの AllowUserSetup プロパティとすべての親コンテナが、neededSetupRights パラメータで指定されたアクセスレベルを許可している必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4545">For this method to return true, the AllowUserSetup property for the design and all parent containers must allow for the level of access that is specified by the neededSetupRights parameter.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4557">ラベル文字列の現在の値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4557">The current value of the label string.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4558">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4558">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4559">ラベルは、コントロール内に表示されているテキストまたはそれに隣接するテキストを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4559">The label determines which text is displayed in the control or adjacent to it.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4560">ラベルのプロパティ値は 250 文字を超えることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4560">The label property value cannot exceed 250 characters.</span></span>

### <a name="method-name"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4788">メソッド名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4788">Method name</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4789">フォーム、レポート、テーブル、クエリ、または別の Finance and Operations アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためのコードで使用される名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4789">Gets or sets the name that is used in code to identify a form, report, table, query, or another Finance and Operations application object.</span></span>

    public str name([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4790">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4790">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4791">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4791">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4792">コントロールに割り当てる名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4792">The name to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4793">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4793">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4794">アプリケーション オブジェクトを識別するためにコードで使用される名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4794">The name that is used in code to identify an application object.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4795">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4795">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4796">オブジェクトの名前プロパティ値は、コードの競合を避けるために、次の基準を満たしている必要があります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4796">The name property value of an object must meet the following criteria to avoid code conflicts:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4797">文字で始めます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4797">Begins with a letter.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4798">250 文字を超えないでください。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4798">Doesn't exceed 250 characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4799">数字とアンダースコア文字を含めることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4799">Can include numbers and underscore characters.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4800">句読点やスペースを含めることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4800">Cannot include punctuation or spaces.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4801">テーブルは、拡張データ型、基本列挙型、クラスなどの他のパブリック オブジェクトと同じ名前を持つことはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4801">Tables cannot have the same name as other public objects, such as extended data types, base enumeration types, classes, and so on.</span></span>

### <a name="method-userhide"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4971">メソッド userHide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4971">Method userHide</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4972">コントロールがユーザーから非表示になっているかどうかを示す値を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4972">Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the control is hidden from the user.</span></span>

    public int userHide([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4973">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4973">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4977">コントロールがユーザーから非表示になっている場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4977">1 if the control is hidden from the user; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-4978">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4978">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-4979">ユーザーは、コントロールが表示されたときにコントロールを右クリックするか、元のコントロールが非表示のときに他のコントロールを右クリックして、コントロールを非表示にするかどうかを指定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4979">The user specifies whether a control is hidden by right-clicking the control when it is viewable or by right-clicking another control when the original control is hidden.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4980">右クリックにより、コントロールを非表示または表示するために使用できるメニューを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4980">A right-click opens a menu that can be used to hide or display the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-4981">このメソッドを使用すると、プログラムによって値を決定して設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-4981">This method lets you programmatically determine and set the value.</span></span>

    public int userSkip([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5012">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5012">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5014">userSkip プロパティに割り当てる値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5014">The value to assign to the userSkip property; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5015">コントロールをスキップするユーザーの設定が有効な場合、この値は 1、それ以外の場合の値は 0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5015">The value is 1 if the user setting to skip the control is in effect; otherwise, the value is 0.</span></span>

### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5018">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5018">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5019">ユーザーによって指定されたコントロールの幅をピクセル単位で設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5019">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels, as specified by the user.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5020">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5020">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5021">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5021">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5022">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5022">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5023">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5023">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5024">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5024">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5025">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5025">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5026">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5026">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5027">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5027">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width of the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5028">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5028">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5072">幅の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5072">An integer that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5073">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5073">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5074">幅の計算方法を示す整数。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5074">An integer that indicates how the width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5075">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5075">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5076">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5076">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5077">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5077">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5078">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5078">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5079">次の表に従って幅を計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5079">Calculate the width according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5080">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5080">Mode</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5081">幅計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5081">Width calculation</span></span>                                                                        |
|----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5082">-1 正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5082">-1 Exact</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5083">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5083">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5084">0 自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5084">0 Auto</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5085">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5085">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5086">1 列の幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5086">1 Column width</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5087">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5087">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5088">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5088">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5089">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5089">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5090">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5090">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5091">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5091">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5092">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5092">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5093">コントロール幅の計算方法を示す整数値。オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5093">An integer value that indicates how control width is calculated; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5094">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5094">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5095">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5095">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5096">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5096">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5097">次の表に従って幅を計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5097">Calculate the width according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5098">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5098">Mode</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5099">幅計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5099">Width calculation</span></span>                                                                        |
|--------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5100">正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5100">Exact</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5101">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5101">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5102">自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5102">Auto</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5103">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5103">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5104">列の幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5104">Column width</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5105">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5105">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5106">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5106">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5107">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5107">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5108">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5108">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5112">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5112">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5113">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5113">The width in pixels of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5114">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5114">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5115">コントロールの幅を変更するには、正確な幅の計算モードを使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5115">To change the width of the control, use the exact width calculation mode.</span></span>

### <a name="method-aligncontrol"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5548">メソッド alignControl</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5548">Method alignControl</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5549">コントロールを配置するかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5549">Determines whether to align the control.</span></span>

    public boolean alignControl([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5550">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5550">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5551">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5551">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5552">プロパティの新しい値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5552">The new value for the property; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5553">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5553">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5554">コントロールをアラインする必要がある場合は true。それ以外の場合は false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5554">true if the control should be aligned; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5555">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5555">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5556">コントロールの左上隅は、最も長いラベルに従って配置されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5556">The upper-left corner of the control is aligned according to the longest label.</span></span>

### <a name="method-allowedit"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5557">メソッド allowEdit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5557">Method allowEdit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5558">ユーザーがコントロールの内容を修正できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5558">Determines whether the user can modify the contents of the control.</span></span>

    public boolean allowEdit([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5559">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5559">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5560">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5560">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5561">allowEdit プロパティに割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5561">The value to assign to the allowEdit property.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5562">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5562">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5563">コントロールを変更することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5563">true if the control can be modified; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5564">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5564">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5565">コンテナー コントロールにこのプロパティが設定されると、コンテナー内のすべてのコントロールの変更は無効または有効になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5565">When this property is set on a container control, modifications are disabled or enabled for all controls in the container.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5566">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5566">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5567">次の例は、allowEdit プロパティの値を返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5567">The following example shows how to return and set the value of the allowEdit property.</span></span>

    // Return the value. 
    info (strfmt("allowEdit: %1", this.allowEdit())); 
    // Set the value. 
    this.allowEdit(false);

### <a name="method-allowsyssetup"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5568">メソッド allowSysSetup</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5568">Method allowSysSetup</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5569">SysSetup フォームにコントロールを表示するかどうかを示す値を取得します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5569">Retrieves a value that indicates whether the control is shown in the SysSetup form.</span></span>

    public boolean allowSysSetup()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5570">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5570">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5571">コントロールが SysSetup フォームに表示される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5571">true if the control is shown in the SysSetup form; otherwise, false.</span></span>

### <a name="method-autodeclaration"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5572">メソッド autoDeclaration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5572">Method autoDeclaration</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5573">システムがコントロールと同じ名前を持つメンバー変数を宣言できるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5573">Determines whether the system can declare a member variable that has the same name as the control.</span></span>

    public boolean autoDeclaration([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5574">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5574">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5575">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5575">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5576">autoDeclaration プロパティに割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5576">The value to assign to the autoDeclaration property.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5577">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5577">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5578">このコントロールのためにメンバー変数を宣言することができる場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5578">true if the member variable can be declared for this control; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5579">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5579">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5580">コントロールには同じ名前を付けることはできません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5580">Controls cannot have identical names.</span></span>

### <a name="method-backgroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5581">メソッド backgroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5581">Method backgroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5582">コントロールの背景色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5582">Gets or sets the background color of the control.</span></span>

    public int backgroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5583">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5583">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5584">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5584">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5585">コントロールの背景色として割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5585">The value to assign as the background color of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5586">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5586">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5587">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5587">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5588">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5588">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5589">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5589">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5590">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5590">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5591">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5591">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5592">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5592">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5593">上位バイトは 0 (ゼロ) でなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5593">The high-order byte must be 0 (zero).</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5594">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5594">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5595">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5595">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5596">次の例は、コントロールの背景色を返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5596">The following example shows how to return and set the background color for a control.</span></span>

    // Retrieve the existing background color. 
    info (strfmt("Background color: %1", this.backgroundColor())); 
    // Set the background color. 
    this.backgroundColor(WindowsPalette::DarkShadow3D);

### <a name="method-backstyle"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5597">メソッド backStyle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5597">Method backStyle</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5598">コントロールの背景色を透明にできるかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5598">Determines whether the control background can be transparent.</span></span>

    public int backStyle([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5599">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5599">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5600">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5600">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5601">コントロールの背景スタイルとして割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5601">The value to assign as the background style of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5602">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5602">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5603">コントロールの背景が透明の場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、0 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5603">1 if the control background can be transparent; otherwise, 0.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5604">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5604">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5605">次の例は、背景スタイルを返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5605">The following example shows how to return and set the background style.</span></span>

    // Return the background style. 
    info (strfmt("Background style: %1", this.backStyle())); 
    // Set the background style. 
    this.backStyle(FormBackStyle::Transparent);

### <a name="method-begindrag"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5606">メソッド beginDrag</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5606">Method beginDrag</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5607">ユーザーがフォーム ツリー コントロールのドラッグを始めると呼び出されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5607">Is called when the user starts to drag a form tree control.</span></span>

    public int beginDrag(int x, int y)

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5608">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5608">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5609">x</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5609">x</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5610">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5610">An Integer data type that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5611">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5611">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5612">y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5612">y</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5613">マウス ポインターの y 座標を示す整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5613">An Integer data type that indicates the y-coordinate of the mouse pointer.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5614">座標はコントロールの左上隅を基準にしています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5614">The coordinate is relative to the upper-left corner of the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5615">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5615">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5616">イベントが処理された場合は 0 (ゼロ) です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5616">0 (zero) if the event has been handled.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5617">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5617">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5618">このイベントは、コントロールの DragDrop プロパティが有効でない限り発生しません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5618">This event is not raised unless the DragDrop property is enabled for the control.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5619">コントロールをドラッグするには、コントロール領域内でマウス ボタンを押した後、マウス ポインターを移動します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5619">To drag a control, the user presses the mouse button in the control area and then moves the mouse pointer.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5620">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5620">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5621">次の例では、ユーザーがフォーム ツリー コントロールのドラッグを開始したときに、Infolog の x 座標と y 座標を表示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5621">The following example displays the x-coordinates and y-coordinates in the Infolog when the user starts to drag the form tree control.</span></span>

    public int beginDrag(int _x, int _y) 
    { 
        int ret; 
        info(strfmt("beginDrag (x, y) : (%1, %2)", _x, _y)); 
        ret = super(_x, _y); 
        return ret; 
    }

    public boolean beginLabelEdit(int Idx, str text, AnyType data)

### <a name="method-bold"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5628">メソッド bold</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5628">Method bold</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5629">コントロール内のテキストを表示するのに使用されるフォントの重量を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5629">Gets or sets the font weight that is used to display text in the control.</span></span>

    public int bold([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5630">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5630">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5631">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5631">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5632">コントロールのボールド設定に割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5632">The value to assign to the bold setting for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5633">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5633">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5634">0 (ゼロ) から 9 までの間の整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5634">An integer value between 0 (zero) and 9, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5635">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5635">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5636">返される整数には、次のようなフォントの重量が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5636">The integer that is returned contains the weight of the font as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5637">0 - 既定のフォントの重量を使用します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5637">0 – Use the default font weight.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5638">1 - シン。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5638">1 – Thin.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5639">2 - エクストラ ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5639">2 – Extra-light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5640">3 - ライト。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5640">3 – Light.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5641">4 - 標準。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5641">4 – Normal.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5642">5 - 中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5642">5 – Medium.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5643">6 - セミボールド。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5643">6 – Semibold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5644">7 - 太字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5644">7 – Bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5645">8 - 極太。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5645">8 – Extra-bold.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5646">9 - ヘビー。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5646">9 – Heavy.</span></span>

### <a name="method-border"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5647">メソッド border</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5647">Method border</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5648">コントロールの境界のスタイルを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5648">Gets or sets the style of the border for the control.</span></span>

    public int border([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5649">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5649">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5650">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5650">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5651">コントロールの境界スタイルとして割り当てる値 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5651">The value to assign as the border style for the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5652">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5652">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5653">0 (ゼロ) から 4 までの整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5653">An integer between 0 (zero) and 4, inclusive.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5654">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5654">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5655">返される整数には、次のようなコントロールの境界線のスタイルが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5655">The integer that is returned contains the style of the border for the control as follows.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5656">先頭値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5656">Value</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5657">説明</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5657">Description</span></span> |
|-------|-------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5658">0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5658">0</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5659">自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5659">Auto</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5660">1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5660">1</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5661">3D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5661">3D</span></span>          |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5662">2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5662">2</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5663">単一明細行</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5663">Single line</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5664">3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5664">3</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5665">均一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5665">Flat</span></span>        |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5666">4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5666">4</span></span>     | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5667">None</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5667">None</span></span>        |

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5668">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5668">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5669">次の例は、コントロールの境界線のスタイルを取得および設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5669">The following example shows how to retrieve and set the border style for a control.</span></span>

    // Retrieve the border style. 
    info (strfmt("border: %1", this.border())); 
    // Set the border style. 
    this.border(2);

    public boolean canScroll([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5680">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5680">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5681">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5681">value</span></span>

### <a name="method-cascadeselect"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5683">メソッド cascadeSelect</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5683">Method cascadeSelect</span></span>

    public boolean cascadeSelect([boolean value])

### <a name="method-configurationkey"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5767">メソッド configurationKey</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5767">Method configurationKey</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5768">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーション キーを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5768">Gets or sets the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

    public ConfigurationKeyId configurationKey([ConfigurationKeyId value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5769">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5769">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5770">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5770">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5771">コントロールに割り当てるコンフィギュレーション キーの ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5771">The ID of the configuration key to assign to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5772">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5772">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5773">コントロールに割り当てられるコンフィギュレーション キーの ID。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5773">The ID of the configuration key that is assigned to the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5774">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5774">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5775">コンフィギュレーション キーは、このコントロールを表示するかどうかを決定するために使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5775">The configuration key is used to determine whether this control can be displayed.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5776">コンフィギュレーション キーがシステムで無効な場合、コントロールはフォームで表示されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5776">If the configuration key is disabled in the system, the control is not displayed in the form.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5777">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5777">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5778">次の例は、コントロールのコンフィギュレーション キーを設定して取得する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5778">The following example shows how to set and retrieve the configuration key for a control.</span></span>

    DictConfigurationKey dck; 
    configurationKeyId cki; 
    // objCtrl previously assigned. 
    // Assign a configuration key to the control. 
    objCtrl.configurationKey(configurationkeynum(BankDeposit)); 
    // Retrieve the configuration key ID from the control. 
    cki = objCtrl.configurationKey(); 
    if (cki != 0) 
    { 
        dck = new DictConfigurationKey(cki); 
        if (dck) 
        { 
        print strfmt("Configuration Key ID: %1 Configuration Key Name: %2", 
                      cki, 
                      dck.name()); 
        } 
    }

### <a name="method-configurationkeyex"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5779">メソッド configurationKeyEx</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5779">Method configurationKeyEx</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5780">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5780">Returns a list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

    public List configurationKeyEx()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5781">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5781">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5782">コントロールが有効になっているコンフィギュレーション キーの ID を含む一覧。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5782">A list that contains the IDs of configuration keys that are in effect for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5783">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5783">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5784">コントロールがデータソースにバインドされている場合、返された構成キー ID のリストには、テーブルとフィールドの構成キー ID も含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5784">If the control is bound to a data source, the returned list of configuration key IDs also includes the configuration key ID for the table and field.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5785">また、返されたリストには、プロパティ、拡張データ型、または enumType メソッドに適用される任意のコンフィギュレーション キー ID が含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5785">The returned list also contains any configuration key IDs that are applied to the properties, extended data type, or enumType methods.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5786">リストに重複 ID は含まれません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5786">The list does not contain duplicate IDs.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5787">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5787">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5788">次の例は、コントロールのコンフィギュレーション キー ID を取得する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5788">The following example shows how to retrieve the configuration key IDs for a control.</span></span>

    DictConfigurationKey dck; 
    configurationKeyId cki; 
    List list; 
    ListEnumerator enum;
    // objCtrl previously assigned. 
    list = objCtrl.configurationKeyEx(); 
    if (0 != list.elements()) 
    { 
        enum = list.getEnumerator(); 
        while (enum.moveNext()) 
        { 
           dck = new DictConfigurationKey(enum.current()); 
           if (dck) 
           { 
            print strfmt("Configuration Key ID: %1 Configuration Key Name: %2", 
                         enum.current(), 
                         dck.name() ); 
           } 
        } 
    }

### <a name="method-countryregioncodes"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5795">メソッド countryRegionCodes</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5795">Method countryRegionCodes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5805">DataField オブジェクトのフィールド バインディングを相対的なテーブルにリンクするリレーションのピリオドで区切られた一覧を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5805">Gets or sets the period-delimited list of relations that links the field binding of the DataField object to a relative table.</span></span>

    public str dataRelationPath([str value])

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5809">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5809">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5810">DataField オブジェクトのフィールド バインディングを相対的なテーブルにリンクするリレーションのピリオドで区切られた一覧。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5810">The period-delimited list of relations that links the field binding of the DataField object to a relative table.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5811">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5811">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5812">このメソッドは、参照グループ コントロールによって使用され、どの関係が使用される置換フィールドを生成するかを正確に追跡します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5812">This method is used by the reference group control to track exactly which relations produce the replacement field that is used.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5813">参照グループ コントロールを有効にして、そこに含まれるコントロールに一貫したバインディングを行います。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5813">It enables the reference group control to bind consistently to the controls that it contains.</span></span>

### <a name="method-delete"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5814">メソッド delete</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5814">Method delete</span></span>

    public boolean delete(int Idx)

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5822">次の例は、フォーム ツリー コントロールの最初の項目を削除する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5822">The following example shows how to delete the first item in the form tree control.</span></span>

    boolean bDelete; 
    bDelete = ftc.delete(0);

### <a name="method-displaytarget"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5829">メソッド displayTarget</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5829">Method displayTarget</span></span>

    public int displayTarget([int value])

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5834">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5834">Return Value</span></span>

### <a name="method-dragdrop"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5836">メソッド dragDrop</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5836">Method dragDrop</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5837">コントロールのドラッグ アンド ドロップ操作を有効または無効にするかどうかを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5837">Determines whether drag-and-drop operations are enabled or disabled for the control.</span></span>

    public int dragDrop([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5838">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5838">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5839">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5839">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5840">ドラッグ アンド ドロップ動作が有効になっているかどうかを示す整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5840">An Integer data type that indicates whether drag-and-drop behavior is enabled.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5841">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5841">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5842">ドラッグ アンド ドロップ操作が有効な場合は 1、それ以外の場合は、false です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5842">1 if drag-and-drop operations are enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5843">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5843">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5844">次の例は、ドラッグ アンド ドロップの動作が有効かどうかを示す値を返すか、設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5844">The following example shows how to return or set the value that indicates whether drag-and-drop behavior is enabled.</span></span>

    boolean dDragDrop; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned  
    // as a FormTreeControl value. 
    // Retrieve the drag–and–drop-enabled value. 
    dDragDrop = ctrl.dragDrop(); 
    // Set the drag–and–drop-enabled value. 
    ctrl.dragDrop(true);

### <a name="method-enabled"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5879">メソッド enabled</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5879">Method enabled</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5880">オブジェクトが有効か無効かを決定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5880">Determines whether the object is enabled or disabled.</span></span>

    public boolean enabled([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5881">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5881">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5882">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5882">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5883">コントロールが有効かどうかを指定するブール値; オプション。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5883">A Boolean value that specifies whether the control is enabled.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5884">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5884">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5885">オブジェクトが有効である場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5885">true if the object is enabled; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5886">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5886">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5887">有効になっているプロパティを使用すると、実行時にコントロールを有効または無効にできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5887">The enabled property lets you enable or disable controls at run time.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5888">たとえば、アプリケーションの現在の状態には適用されないオブジェクトを無効にすることができます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5888">For example, you can disable objects that do not apply to the current state of the application.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5889">また、読み取り専用情報を提供するエラー メッセージなど、表示のためにのみ使用されるコントロールを無効にすることもできます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5889">You can also disable a control that is used only for display purposes, such as an error message that provides read-only information.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5890">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5890">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5891">次の例は、コントロールの有効なプロパティを返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5891">The following example shows how to return and set the enabled property for a control.</span></span>

    // Return the value of the enabled property. 
    info(strfmt("enabled: %1",this.enabled())); 
    // Set the enabled property. 
    this.enabled(false);

### <a name="method-font"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5903">メソッド font</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5903">Method font</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5904">コントロール内のテキストに使用されるフォントの名前を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5904">Gets or sets the name of the font that is used for the text in the control.</span></span>

    public str font([str value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5905">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5905">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5906">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5906">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5907">フォーム ツリー コントロールのテキストに使用するフォントを示す文字列値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5907">A string value that indicates the font to use for the text in a form tree control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5908">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5908">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5909">Tahoma や Verdana など、使用するフォントの名前。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5909">The name of the font to use, such as Tahoma or Verdana.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5910">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5910">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5911">次の例は、フォーム ツリー コントロールのフォントを返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5911">The following example shows how to return and set the font for a form tree control.</span></span>

    str strFont; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned  
    // as a form tree control variable. 
    // Retrieve the font. 
    strFont = ctrl.font(); 
    // Set the font. 
    ctrl.font("Times New Roman");

### <a name="method-fontsize"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5912">メソッド fontSize</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5912">Method fontSize</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5913">コントロール内のテキストに使用されるフォント サイズを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5913">Gets or sets the font size that is used for the text in the control.</span></span>

    public int fontSize([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5914">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5914">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5915">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5915">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5916">フォーム ツリー コントロール内のテキストのフォント サイズ、ポイントを示す整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5916">An Integer data type that indicates the font size, in points, for the text in a form tree control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5917">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5917">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5918">ポイント単位のフォントの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5918">The height of the font in points.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5919">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5919">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5920">次の例は、コントロールのフォント サイズを返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5920">The following example shows how to return and set the font size for a control.</span></span>

    int nSize; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned  
    // as a form tree control. 
    // Retrieve the font size. 
    nSize = ctrl.fontSize(); 
    // Set the font size. 
    ctrl.fontSize(16);

### <a name="method-foregroundcolor"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5921">メソッド foregroundColor</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5921">Method foregroundColor</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5922">コントロール内のテキストに使用される色を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5922">Gets or sets the color that is used for the text in the control.</span></span>

    public int foregroundColor([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5923">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5923">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5924">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5924">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5925">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5925">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5926">パックされた RGB カラーを含む整数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5926">An integer that contains a packed RGB color.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5927">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5927">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5928">返される整数には、次のようにパックされた RGB カラーが含まれます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5928">The integer that is returned contains a packed RGB color as follows:</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5929">下位バイトには赤の相対強度の値が含まれています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5929">The low-order byte contains a value for the relative intensity of red.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5930">2 番目のバイトには緑の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5930">The second byte contains a value for green.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5931">3 番目のバイトには青の値が入っています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5931">The third byte contains a value for blue.</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5932">上位バイトは 0 (ゼロ) でなければなりません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5932">The high-order byte must be 0 (zero).</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="989a9-5933">1 バイトの最大値は 255 です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5933">The maximum value for a single byte is 255.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5985">ツリー コントロール内の表示されている項目の数を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5985">Returns the number of visible items in the tree control.</span></span>

    public int getVisibleCount()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5986">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5986">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5987">ツリー コントロール内の表示されている項目の数。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5987">The number of visible items in the tree control.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5988">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5988">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5989">次の例は、ツリー コントロール内の表示される項目の数を取得する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5989">The following example shows how to retrieve the number of visible items in the tree control.</span></span>

    int nCount; 
    nCount = this.getVisibleCount(); 
    info (strfmt("getVisibleCount: %1", int2str(nCount)));

### <a name="method-hasbuttons"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5990">メソッド hasButtons</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5990">Method hasButtons</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5991">ツリー コントロールが展開/折り畳みボタンを表示するかどうかを示す値を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5991">Returns a value that indicates whether the tree control uses expand/collapse buttons.</span></span>

    public boolean hasButtons([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5992">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5992">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5993">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5993">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5994">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5994">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5995">ツリー コントロールが展開/折りたたみボタンを使用する場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5995">true if the tree control uses expand/collapse buttons; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5996">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5996">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5997">次の例は、ツリー コントロールが展開/折りたたみボタンを使用するかどうかを示す値を取得する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5997">The following example shows how to retrieve the value that indicates whether the tree control uses expand/collapse buttons.</span></span>

    boolean bHasButtons; 
    // Retrieve the value. 
    bHasButtons = this.hasButtons(); 
    info (strfmt("hasButtons: %1",bHasButtons)); 
    // Set the value. 
    this.hasButtons(false);

### <a name="method-haschanged"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-5998">メソッド hasChanged</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5998">Method hasChanged</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-5999">ツリー コントロールの内容が変更されたかどうかを示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-5999">Sets or returns a value that indicates whether the contents of the tree control have changed.</span></span>

    public boolean hasChanged([boolean val])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6000">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6000">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6001">val</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6001">val</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6002">ツリー コントロールの hasChanged 値として割り当てる値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6002">The value to assign as the hasChanged value for the tree control.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6003">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6003">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6004">ツリー コントロールの内容が変更された場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6004">true if the contents of the tree control have changed; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6005">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6005">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6006">次の例は、ツリー コントロールの内容が変更されたかどうかを示す値を返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6006">The following example shows how to return and set the value that indicates whether the contents of the tree control have changed.</span></span>

    boolean bHasChanged; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned 
    // as a FormTreeControl variable. 
    // Retrieve the hasChanged value. 
    bHasChanged = ctrl.hasChanged(); 
    // Modify the hasChanged value. 
    ctrl.hasChanged(true);

### <a name="method-haslines"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6007">メソッド hasLines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6007">Method hasLines</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6008">ツリー コントロールがツリー コネクタ明細行を表示するかどうかを示す値を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6008">Returns a value that indicates whether the tree control displays tree connector lines.</span></span>

    public boolean hasLines([boolean value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6009">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6009">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6010">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6010">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6011">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6011">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6012">ツリー コントロールにツリー コネクタ行が表示される場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6012">true if the tree control displays tree connector lines; otherwise, false.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6013">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6013">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6014">次の例は、ツリー コントロールがツリー コネクタ ラインを表示するかどうかを示す値を取得する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6014">The following example shows how to retrieve the value that indicates whether the tree control displays tree connector lines.</span></span>

    boolean bHasLines; 
    // Retrieve the value. 
    bHasLines = this.hasLines(); 
    info (strfmt("hasLines: %1", bHasLines)); 
    // Set the value. 
    this.hasLines(false);

### <a name="method-hasusersetting"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6015">メソッド hasUserSetting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6015">Method hasUserSetting</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6016">コントロールにカスタム ユーザー設定があるかどうかを示します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6016">Indicates whether the control has custom user settings.</span></span>

    public boolean hasUserSetting()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6017">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6017">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6018">コントロールにカスタム ユーザー設定がある場合は true。それ以外の場合は、false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6018">true if the control has custom user settings; otherwise, false.</span></span>

### <a name="method-height"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6019">メソッド height</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6019">Method height</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6020">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6020">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int height(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6021">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6021">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6022">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6022">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6023">高さの計算方法を示す整数データ型です。オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6023">An Integer data type that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6024">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6024">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6025">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6025">mode</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6026">高さの計算方法を示す整数データ型です。オプションです。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6026">An Integer data type that indicates how the height is calculated; optional.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6027">これは、次のいずれかの値になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6027">This can be one of the following values:</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6028">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6028">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6029">ピクセル単位のコントロールの高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6029">The height of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6030">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6030">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6031">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6031">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6032">次の表に従って高さを計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6032">Calculate the height according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6033">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6033">Mode</span></span>              | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6034">高さの計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6034">Height calculation</span></span>                                                                         |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6035">-1 - 正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6035">-1 – Exact</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6036">ピクセル単位のコントロールの正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6036">The exact height of the control in pixels is used.</span></span>                                         |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6037">0 - 自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6037">0 – Auto</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6038">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6038">The height of the control is calculated automatically, and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6039">1 - 列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6039">1 – Column height</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6040">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6040">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                               |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6041">高さと高さ計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6041">The height and the height calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-heightmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6042">メソッド heightMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6042">Method heightMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6043">コントロールの高さの計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6043">Gets or sets a calculation mode for the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6044">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6044">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6045">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6045">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6046">コントロールの高さの計算方法を示す整数データ型値です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6046">An Integer data type value that indicates how the height of the control is calculated.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6047">この値は、 Exact モードの場合は -1、Auto モードの場合は 0、Column height モードの場合は 1 になります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6047">This value can be -1 for Exact mode, 0 for Auto mode, or 1 for Column height mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6048">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6048">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6049">高さ計算モード。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6049">The height calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6050">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6050">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6051">次の表に従って高さを計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6051">Calculate the height according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6052">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6052">Mode</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6053">高さの計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6053">Height calculation</span></span>                                                                         |
|---------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6054">正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6054">Exact</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6055">ピクセル単位のコントロールの正確な高さが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6055">The exact height of the control in pixels is used.</span></span>                                         |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6056">自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6056">Auto</span></span>          | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6057">コントロールの高さは自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6057">The height of the control is calculated automatically, and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6058">1 列の高さ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6058">Column height</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-6059">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの高さが決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6059">The layout of the form determines the height of the control.</span></span>                               |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6060">計算モードが [自動] または [列の高さ] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの高さが変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6060">The height of the control might change when the calculation mode is set to Auto or Column height.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6061">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6061">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6062">次の例は、ツリー コントロールの高さ計算モードを返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6062">The following example shows how to return and set the height calculation mode for a form tree control.</span></span>

    int nHeightMode; 
    ; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned 
    // as a form tree control variable. 
    // Retrieve the height mode. 
    nHeightMode = ctrl.HeightMode(); 
    // Set the height mode. 
    ctrl.heightMode(-1); 
    // Set the height. 
    ctrl.heightValue(160);

### <a name="method-heightvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6063">メソッド heightValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6063">Method heightValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6064">コントロールの高さを取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6064">Gets or sets the height of the control.</span></span>

    public int heightValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6065">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6065">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6066">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6066">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6067">高さをピクセル単位で指定する整数データ型です。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6067">An Integer data type that specifies the height in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6068">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6068">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6069">ピクセル単位の高さ。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6069">The height in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6070">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6070">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6071">正確な高さ計算モードが使用されていない限り、コントロールの高さは変更されません。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6071">The height of the control is not changed unless the Exact height calculation mode is used.</span></span>

#### <a name="examples"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6072">例</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6072">Examples</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6073">次の例は、フォーム ツリー コントロールの高さの値を返して設定する方法を示しています。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6073">The following example shows how to return and set the height value of a form tree control.</span></span>

    int nHeightValue; 
    // The ctrl variable was previously assigned 
    // as a form tree control variable. 
    // Retrieve the height value. 
    nHeightValue = ctrl.heightValue(); 
    // Set the height value. 
    ctrl.heightMode(-1); 
    ctrl.heightValue(160);

### <a name="method-helpfield"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6074">メソッド helpField</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6074">Method helpField</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6075">コントロールのヘルプ テキストを返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6075">Returns the Help text for the control.</span></span>

    public str helpField()

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6076">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6076">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-6077">コントロールのヘルプ テキスト。コントロールにヘルプ テキストがない場合は空の文字列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6077">The Help text for the control; an empty string if there is no Help text for the control.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-6078">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-6078">Remarks</span></span>
