### <a name="method-userwidth"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7895">メソッド userWidth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7895">Method userWidth</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7896">ユーザーによって指定されたコントロールの幅をピクセル単位で設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7896">Sets or returns the width of the control in pixels, as specified by the user.</span></span>

    public int userWidth([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7897">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7897">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7898">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7898">value</span></span>  
<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7899">コントロールの幅として使用するピクセル数 (オプション)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7899">The number of pixels to use as the width of the control; optional.</span></span>

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7900">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7900">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7901">ユーザーがコントロールの幅として指定したピクセル数。ユーザーが文字の幅を指定しなかった場合は 0 (ゼロ)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7901">The number of pixels that the user specified as the width of the control; 0 (zero) if the user did not specify a character width.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7902">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7902">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7903">userWidth メソッドは、文字数の 6 倍に基づいてピクセル単位の幅を返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7903">The userWidth method returns the width in pixels, based on six times the number of characters.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7904">たとえば、ユーザーのコントロールの幅として 30 文字が指定されている場合、戻り値は 6 \* 30 = 180 となります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7904">For example, if the user has specified 30 characters as the width of the control, the return value is 6 \* 30 = 180.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7905">コントロールの幅を文字で指定するには、コントロールを右クリックして、文字指定を行う設定フォームを開きます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7905">To specify the width of the control in characters, users can right-click the control to open the setup form where the character specification is made.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7931">コントロールが表示されるかどうかを示す値を設定するか返します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7931">Sets or returns a value that indicates whether the control is visible.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7936">コントロールが可視である場合は true。それ以外の場合は false。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7936">true if the control is visible; otherwise, false.</span></span>

### <a name="method-width"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7937">メソッド width</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7937">Method width</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7938">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7938">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int width(int value, [int mode])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7939">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7939">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7940">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7940">value</span></span>  

<!-- -->

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7941">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7941">mode</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7942">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7942">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7943">ピクセル単位のコントロールの幅。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7943">The width of the control in pixels.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7944">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7944">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7945">値のパラメータを省略すると、正確なモードが使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7945">Exact mode is used if the value parameter is omitted.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7946">次の表に従って幅を計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7946">Calculate the width according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7947">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7947">Mode</span></span>           | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7948">幅計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7948">Width calculation</span></span>                                                                        |
|----------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7949">-1 正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7949">-1 Exact</span></span>       | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7950">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7950">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7951">0 自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7951">0 Auto</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7952">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7952">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7953">1 列の幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7953">1 Column width</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7954">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7954">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7955">幅と幅計算モードは別々に設定できます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7955">The width and width calculation mode can be set separately.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthmode"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7956">メソッド widthMode</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7956">Method widthMode</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7957">コントロールの幅の計算方法を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7957">Gets or sets the calculation mode of the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthMode([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7958">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7958">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7959">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7959">value</span></span>  

#### <a name="return-value"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7960">戻り値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7960">Return Value</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7961">現在の計算モードを示す整数値。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7961">An integer value that indicates the current calculation mode.</span></span>

#### <a name="remarks"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7962">備考</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7962">Remarks</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7963">次の表に従って幅を計算します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7963">Calculate the width according to the following table.</span></span>

| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7964">モード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7964">Mode</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7965">幅計算</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7965">Width calculation</span></span>                                                                        |
|--------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7966">正確</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7966">Exact</span></span>        | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7967">コントロールのピクセル単位の正確な幅が使用されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7967">The exact width in pixels of the controls is used.</span></span>                                       |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7968">自動</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7968">Auto</span></span>         | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7969">コントロールの幅は自動的に計算され、value パラメーターは無視されます。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7969">The width of the control is calculated automatically and the value parameter is ignored.</span></span> |
| <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7970">列の幅</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7970">Column width</span></span> | <span data-ttu-id="989a9-7971">フォームのレイアウトによって、コントロールの幅が決まります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7971">The layout of the form determines the width of the control.</span></span>                              |

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7972">モードが [自動] または [列の幅] に設定されている場合は、コントロールの幅が変わることがあります。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7972">The width of the control might change when the mode is set to auto or column width.</span></span>

### <a name="method-widthvalue"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7973">メソッド widthValue</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7973">Method widthValue</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7974">コントロールの幅を取得または設定します。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7974">Gets or sets the width of the control.</span></span>

    public int widthValue([int value])

#### <a name="parameters"></a><span data-ttu-id="989a9-7975">パラメーター</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7975">Parameters</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="989a9-7976">値</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="989a9-7976">value</span></span>
